entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:35 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sydney

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 1:37 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle and showers this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Drizzle and rain showers changing to a few flurries in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
